title: mOhana vamshI
sahitya:
mOhana vamshI vAdana madhurima vAhinilO tanuvu pulakitamainadi


caraNam 1    mOhitulai gOpikA samUhamella maimaraciri 
    caraNam 2    shrI hari iha bAdhalella hariyincenu hAyi golpaganA
    caraNam 3    prANi kOTulella vENu nAdanambu vInula vinabaDaga vEgadari cEranu
    caraNam 4    akaLanka nADamayamai jagamu pulakinca amara dAnava yakSa kinnarAdulu mecca 
nagajA manOharuDu tANDavamu shEyagA munulella mudamandi vandanamu sEyagA
